CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Create Loop tables and task lists
CurrentVersion.description: Insert new Loop tables & task lists directly into whiteboards & copy/paste them across other Microsoft 365 hosts to coauthor content with others in real-time.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: Create Loop tables and task lists
OldVersion.description: Insert new Loop tables & task lists directly into whiteboards & copy/paste them across other Microsoft 365 hosts to coauthor content with others in real-time.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management – Forensic evidence (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: The forensic evidence capability is an opt-in add-in to Insider Risk Management, helping customers’ security teams get visual insights into potentially risky user actions that might lead to a data security incident. Forensic evidence is off by default and policy creation requires dual authorization. Customers determine what triggers the feature and manage investigation processes. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: The roadmap item was inadvertently marked rolling out and has now been updated to reflect the current release phase. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

OldVersion.description: The forensic evidence capability is an opt-in add-in to Insider Risk Management, helping customers’ security teams get visual insights into potentially risky user actions that might lead to a data security incident. Forensic evidence is off by default and policy creation requires dual authorization. Customers determine what triggers the feature and manage investigation processes. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: The roadmap item was inadvertently marked rolling out and has now been updated to reflect the current release phase. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Optical Character Recognition in OneDrive and SharePoint supports multi-page PDF and TIFF files
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Currently, OCR is available only for standalone Images. With this update image-only PDF and TIFF files in OneDrive and SharePoint will also benefit from OCR.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Optical Character Recognition in OneDrive and SharePoint supports multi-page PDF and TIFF files
OldVersion.description:
,
Currently, OCR is available only for standalone Images. With this update image-only PDF and TIFF files in OneDrive and SharePoint will also benefit from OCR.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Extended Real-time telemetry retention for upto 7 days (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: To facilitate meeting quality troubleshooting for admins in Teams admin center, real-time telemetry available during the meeting will be retained for an extended period of time (up to 7 days after meeting is ended) for users with Premium licenses. This will help admins identify and fix quality issues using granular telemetry after the meeting is over for up to 7 days. Note:  We have updated the release phase and month to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Extended Real-time telemetry retention for upto 7 days (Premium)
OldVersion.description:
To facilitate meeting quality troubleshooting
for admins in Teams admin center, real-time telemetry available during the
meeting will be retained for an extended period of time (up to 7 days after
meeting is ended) for users with Premium licenses. This will help admins
identify and fix quality issues using granular telemetry after the meeting is
over for up to 7 days.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Collaborative notes in Teams meeting recordings
CurrentVersion.description: This feature enables users to view and edit collaborative meeting notes while watching Teams meeting recordings in Stream. Collaborative notes allow meeting attendees to co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items. Since Collaborative notes are a Loop component, it is always in sync regardless of how many places they live in.  Assigned tasks in collaborative meeting notes automatically sync with To Do & Planner.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Collaborative notes in Teams meeting recordings
OldVersion.description: This feature enables users to view and edit collaborative meeting notes while watching Teams meeting recordings in Stream. Collaborative notes allow meeting attendees to co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items. Since Collaborative notes are a Loop component, it is always in sync regardless of how many places they live in.  Assigned tasks in collaborative meeting notes automatically sync with To Do & Planner.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Live text
CurrentVersion.description: The ability to see what other users are typing in Whiteboard objects in real-time. i.e. when a user is typing in a sticky note, you will be able to see the text as they type it.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: Live text
OldVersion.description: The ability to see what other users are typing in Whiteboard objects in real-time. i.e. when a user is typing in a sticky note, you will be able to see the text as they type it.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention: - Download File Evidence for Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention investigations
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, DLP investigators can download the full file that resulted in the DLP policy match as evidence in SharePoint and OneDrive for Business. The option to download files will be available for DLP alerts in Microsoft Purview compliance portal as well as the DLP alerts in the Microsoft 365 Defender portal

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention: - Download File Evidence for Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention investigations
OldVersion.description: With this capability, DLP investigators can download the full file that resulted in the DLP policy match as evidence in SharePoint and OneDrive for Business. The option to download files will be available for DLP alerts in Microsoft Purview compliance portal as well as the DLP alerts in the Microsoft 365 Defender portal

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Create up to 50 Viva Connections experiences within a tenant
CurrentVersion.description: Customers with Viva suite or Viva Communications and Communities license can create up to 50 distinct Connections experiences for their audience groups. This is currently limited to only 10 experiences.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Create up to 50 Viva Connections experiences within a tenant
OldVersion.description: Customers with Viva suite or Viva Communications and Communities license can create up to 50 distinct Connections experiences for their audience groups. This is currently limited to only 10 experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Add a hyperlink or text callout to a video at specific times
CurrentVersion.description: Make your video interactive and more engaging by adding annotations that can include hyperlinks and text. Call out important moments or share documents and other links to additional resources. You can add text and links anywhere in the video timeline to help guide your viewers to the right information.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Add a hyperlink or text callout to a video at specific times
OldVersion.description:
Make your video interactive
and more engaging by adding annotations that can include hyperlinks and text.
Call out important moments or share documents and other links to additional resources. You can
add text and links anywhere in the video timeline to help guide your viewers to
the right information.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Adoption Score AI assistance category
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing a new people experiences category in Adoption Score in the Microsoft 365 admin center. The new category helps organizations understand the adoption Microsoft Copilot features in Microsoft 365.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Adoption Score AI assistance category
OldVersion.description: We are introducing a new people experiences category in Adoption Score in the Microsoft 365 admin center. The new category helps organizations understand the adoption Microsoft Copilot features in Microsoft 365.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tags will be supported in Private Channels
CurrentVersion.description: ,Users can now use team tags to @ mention groups of people in private channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tags in Shared Channels
CurrentVersion.description: ,Users can now use team tags to @ mention groups of people within shared channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Save filters for Activity Explorer
CurrentVersion.description: ,Ability to save the filters applied to Activity Explorer and use them later.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Topics in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: Adding topics to posts in Viva Engage will default open for question post types and be aligned with new topic experiences as seen in Answers in Viva.
